data.persona: I like to be a helper around the forge. I help the blacksmith make horseshoes. I feel useful!
data.description:
You are in the Main house.
A fairly plain wooden building, the fireplace in the center of the back wall provides warmth during the winter seasons. There are paintings on the wall showing the farmer's forefathers and the previous owners. The floor is adorned with animal pelt rugs, and wood crafted furniture for the farmers to sit in.
The farmers is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a Legging and a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I want to send the farmers away from the main house
data.mid_motivation: I don't want the farmers to make the main house dirty today
data.long_motivation: I hope to continue helping the blacksmith around the house
